consider.message: Please consider the following points before filing a bug report:

s8.message: If a website doesn't work correctly and temporarily disabling Adblock Plus fixes the issue, the issue is related to the filters. Please report it by other means.

s2.message: Having problems with Adblock Plus? Let us know about them so that we can improve your experience. Download Adblock Plus for Chrome and other platforms here.

s7.message: If an advertisement isn't blocked, the issue is more than likely related to the filters. Please report it by other means.

s6.message: Not all issues are Adblock Plus bugs

s4.message: Having problems with Adblock Plus? Let us know about them so that we can improve your experience. Download Adblock Plus for Chrome and other platforms here.

s19.message: The Adblock Plus version number, e.g. 1.8.12

s18.message: Bug reports should contain the following information:

s17.message: Visit the forum for support or to report an issue.

s15.message: If Adblock Plus fails to install on a supported browser, this is a browser issue and general troubleshooting instructions apply. If you are not using Firefox, see: Chrome, Opera, Safari, Internet Explorer

s14.message:
If an issue occurs prior to the installation of Adblock Plus, or persists after it is uninstalled,
    the issue is not related to Adblock Plus.

s22.message: The exact description of what happens and what you think is wrong

s23.message: My bug report is no longer there. What happened?

s20.message:
All relevant configuration details, e.g. filter lists used, your own filters,
    unusual browser configuration, other extensions, etc.

s21.message: The exact description of the steps that are needed to reproduce the issue

s24.message: If you can't find your bug report, it's likely that the moderators renamed it so that the title better reflects the issue.

OS.message: The computer operating system, e.g. Windows 8.1 64-bit

browser.message: The browser and browser version number, e.g. Chrome 43.0.2357.124
